notes.title: Reps/Sets
notes.content: GVT: 10x10 with 60–90s rest. Strength: 4–6 reps, 4–5 sets. Hypertrophy: 8–12 reps, 3–4 sets.

notes.title: Equipment
notes.content: Substitute exercises based on gym access (e.g., TRX for rows if no cable machine).

notes.title: Joint Safety
notes.content: Use machines/cables for high-volume work if joints are sensitive.
